name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Tech Lead with 8 years of experience specializing in **React.js**, **PHP**, **Java**, and **Docker** technologies, adept at driving API-first design and modular design principles. Proven track record in scaling patterns and implementing async communications while employing Agile and Lean methodologies to enhance team collaboration and efficiency. I have successfully led multiple projects within the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on developing enterprise-grade applications that integrate AI capabilities and educational platforms tailored for both the UK and US education systems.
Leveraging a robust tech stack that includes **AWS**, CI/CD automation, and DevOps practices, I foster code quality and rigorous testing standards to deliver high-performance solutions. My strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and MLOps workflows allows me to implement intelligent automation, real-time data processing, and compliant solutions, ensuring robust application security aligned with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My excellent communication skills and collaborative mindset enable me to work effectively across teams, driving innovative solutions that meet business goals.
